Package com.mobilerq.android.sdk

MobileRQ's Android SDK.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MrqCommonContentListFragment
    A common interface for content list fragments
    MrqContentListAdapter.OnContentViewListener
    A listener for content views.
    MrqContentView.OnLoadListener
    Listen for content load events.
    MrqContentView.OnViewListener
    MrqContentView.OnViewListener.onView(MrqContentView) will be called when visible content is attached or loaded.
    MrqDataProvider
    An interface specifying a type that MrqSdk will use to retrieve the user's current context.
    MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener
    Implement this listener to be notified by MrqSdk when content changes.
    MrqSdkListener
    Interface for Activities that need an instance of MrqSdk.
    MrqSlotView.OnContentClickListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MrqAddress
    Represents a physical street address.
    MrqContent  
    MrqContentListAdapter
    Adapt a list of MrqContent to a list of View.
    MrqContentListFragment
    Display a scrolling list of content matching a slot name.
    MrqContentListLoader
    Load content updates asynchronously from MrqSdk.
    MrqContentView
    A view for a single MrqContent.
    MrqEvent
    An event that is relevant to the customer.
    MrqGeoLocation
    Represents a location with a latitude and longitude.
    MrqLocationService
    MrqLocationService is a service that monitors location changes for the device.
    MrqOfferViewFragment Deprecated
    Use MrqContentListFragment
    MrqOfferViewSupportFragment Deprecated
    Use MrqSupportContentListFragment
    MrqPushReceiver Deprecated
    Use MrqSdk.onGcmMessageReceived(Context, Bundle) instead.
    MrqSdk
    Android client for MobileRQ.
    MrqSlotNamePredicate
    Filter MrqContent by slot name.
    MrqSlotView
    A View that displays a single piece of content for a slot.
    MrqSupportContentListFragment
    Static library support version of MrqContentListFragment.
    MrqSupportContentListLoader
    Static library support version of MrqContentListLoader.
    MrqUserContext
    A representation of the current app user context.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MrqEventType
    An enum for MrqEvent types.
